alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued September 28 at 2:05PM MST until September 28 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 300 PM MST. * At 204 PM MST, a wall of dust was developing along a line extending from Tumbleweed Park to Sun Lakes to near Bapchule, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 164 and 175. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 156 and 163. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 175 and 189. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Bapchule and Santan. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
